author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE PASSING FAR SOUTH OF LAYSAN ISLAND AND CONTINUING WEST-NORTHWEST TOWARD THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE...
summary:
...HONE PASSING FAR SOUTH OF LAYSAN ISLAND AND CONTINUING WEST-NORTHWEST TOWARD THE INTERNATIONAL DATE LINE...
 As of 11:00 AM HST Thu Aug 29
 the center of Hone was located near 21.4, -172.4
 with movement WNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
